attributes.action: Give A-level students across the UK their KS5 target grades if schools close.
attributes.background: I would like the government to give fair opportunities to students across the UK if COVID-19 causes schools to close. All students across the UK should be awarded their KS5 target grades instead of pushing back A-levels.

rejection.details: Decisions about exams are a matter for exam boards and individual schools, and are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.
